name: Dice Irae
description:
Description:
A quirky visual novel meets auto-battler created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Follow the story of an imaginative youngster as they seek to process their best friend's mother falling into a coma. Meet a small cast of colorful characters that crack jokes at each other's expense and help you along in your journey. Experience the game through a paper cut-out style with a custom moody and expressive orchestral soundtrack.

Art and audio were both created by members of the team for this project - come experience the unique flavor this game has to offer!
The team:

UnderWander - Programmer

sunbell - Artist

Av1anation - Designer & Writer

railsmusic - Audio
